Thanks for lovely messages. The mugging happened 17 YEARS ago...so I’m fine.
He cut handbag from me with a knife. I ran after him in a rage. Caught up with him, shaking out bag. He ran off, with cash. I retrieved phone & keys.
Realised afterwards he’d cut through my coat.
Not sure it was brave. Was acting on instinct. Wouldn’t recommend. https://t.co/oA4qZnDaqk
